game.name: Cook, Serve, Delicious: Re-Mustard!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The million-selling cooking sim is BACK in this all new re-imagining of a classic! An all new campaign, expanded music, new foods and art, and new gameplay modes round out a celebration of the ten year anniversary of this massive series.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The million-selling cooking sim is BACK in this all new re-imagining of a classic! An all new campaign, expanded music, new foods and art, and new gameplay modes round out a celebration of the ten year anniversary of this massive series.
